LanguageData.sd_bridges.doubledrawbridge_up_Desc: Click to pull double drawbridge up
LanguageData.sd_bridges.doubledrawbridge_down_Desc: Click to let double drawbridge down
LanguageData.sd_bridges_drawbridge_not_both_water: Not both tiles are water! (the bridge down needs water tiles below. up it needs 1 below and the one in front.)
LanguageData.sd_bridges_doubledrawbridge_not_both_wat: Not all tiles are water! (the bridge down needs water tiles below. up it needs 1 below and the two in front.)
LanguageData.sd_bridges_placeworker_drawbridge_desc: Must be placed on water or marsh terrain.
LanguageData.sd_bridges_placeworker_doubledrawbridge_: Must be placed on water or marsh terrain.
LanguageData.sd_bridges_placeworker_FundamentBaseNotI: Can not be placed on deep water. Terraform first.
LanguageData.sd_bridges_placeworker_OnFundamentBasis_: Must be placed on a foundation.
LanguageData.sd_bridges_placeworker_OnShallowWater_de: Must be placed on shallow water.
LanguageData.sd_bridges_placeworker_notonfoundation_d: You can not place pontoon bridges on foundations.
